tit.e: Makimuku Katsuyama-kofun Tumulus (a tumulus in the Makimuku-kofun Tumuli Cluster in Sakurai City, Nara Prefecture)
Makimuku Katsuyama-kofun Tumulus (a tumulus in the Makimuku-kofun Tumuli Cluster in Sakurai City, Nara Prefecture)

sen.j: 纒向勝山古墳（まきむくかつやまこふん）は、奈良県桜井市の纒向古墳群に属する古墳。
sen.e: The Makimuku Katsuyama Kofun is a kofun (ancient tomb) belonging to the Makimuku Katsuyama Kofun Group.
The Makimuku Katsuyama-kofun Tumulus is an ancient tomb belonging to the Makimuku Katsuyama-kofun Tumuli Cluster.
The Makimuku Katsuyama-kofun Tumulus is an ancient tomb belonging to the Makimuku Katsuyama-kofun Tumuli Cluster.

tit.cmt: 統一リストに合わせました。

sen.j: 所在地：桜井市東田（ひがいだ）町字勝山
sen.e: Location: Aza Katsuyama, Higaida-cho, Sakurai City, Burier; Unknown
Location: Aza Katsuyama, Higaida-cho, Sakurai City
sen.cmt: 不要な語を削除しました。
sen.e: Location: Aza Katsuyama, Higaida-cho, Sakurai City
Burier; Unknown,
sen.cmt: 埋葬者は被葬者のミスかも。その場合はBuried personとなりますが、原文通りにしております。
sen.e: Burier: Unknown,
Buried person: Unknown
sen.cmt: Burier→Buried person埋葬者はこの場合被葬者と判断しました。

sen.j: 築造時期：古墳時代前期初頭
sen.e: Time of Construction: The early first half of the Kofun period
Time of Construction: The early first half of the Kofun period (Tumulus period)
Time of Construction: The early first half of the Kofun period (Tumulus period)

sen.j: 墳 形：前方後円墳（葺石・埴輪無し）
sen.e: Tomb shape: Zenpokoenfun or large keyhole-shaped tomb (no fukiishi or layer of stone covering the soil over a burial mound/no haniwa or clay figure)
Tomb shape: A large keyhole-shaped mound (no fukiishi [layer of stone covering the soil over a burial mound], no haniwa [clay figure])
Tomb shape: A large keyhole-shaped mound (no fukiishi [layer of stone covering the soil over a burial mound], no haniwa [clay figure])

sen.j: 規 模：全長約110m、後円部径約60m、後円部の高さ約7m、周濠幅約25m。
sen.e: Size: About 111m in full length, the back circular part about 60m in diameter and about 7m in height, the moat around the tomb 25m in width.

Size: Approximately 110 meters in full length, the back circular part approximately 60 meters in diameter and approximately 7 meters in height, the moat around the mound approximately 25 meters in width.
sen.cmt: 数値を修正し、用語を変えました。
sen.e: Size: Approximately 110 meters in full length, the back circular part approximately 60 meters in diameter and approximately 7 meters in height, the moat around the mound approximately 25 meters in width.

sen.j: 埋葬部：未調査のため詳細不明。
sen.e: Burial spot: Details unknown because of no investigation made.
Burial spot: Details unknown because of no investigation made.
Burial spot: Details unknown because of no investigation made.

sen.j: 出土遺物：主に周濠部より出土。
sen.e: Unearthed goods: Excavated mainly from a shugo (loop moat).
Unearthed goods: Excavated mainly from a shugo (a surrounding moat).
sen.cmt: 用語集に合わせました。
sen.e: Unearthed goods: Excavated mainly from a shugo (a surrounding moat).
Wooden sword handles
Wooden sword handles
Wooden sword handles
Fans
Fans
Fans
Tools for religious service such as tanks
Tools for religious service such as tanks
Tools for religious service such as tanks

sen.j: Ｕ字形木製品（クビレ部の周濠から出土）
sen.e: U-shaped wooden products (excavated from a constricted spot of the shugo)
U-shaped wooden products (excavated from a constricted spot of the shugo)
U-shaped wooden products (excavated from a constricted spot of the shugo)
Haji potteries (Furu 0-type earthen vessels)
Haji potteries (Furu 0-type earthen vessels)
Haji potteries (Furu 0-type earthen vessels)

tit.e: Method of Measuring the Age from Tree Rings
Method of Measuring the Age from Tree Rings
Method of Measuring the Age from Tree Rings

sen.j: 第4次調査において周濠クビレ部埋土中より検出されたヒノキ板材を奈良文化財研究所埋蔵文化財センターにて年輪年代測定の結果、伐採年代は、新しく見積もっても西暦210年頃と推定されることが判明する。
sen.e: The Nara National Research Institute for Cultural Properties Archaeological Center measured the age of Japanese cypress boards excavated from the mud at the constricted spot of the shugo, and as a result, it was made clear that the original tree is presumed to have been cut down about in 210 at the latest.

The Nara National Research Institute for Cultural Properties Archaeological Center measured the age of Japanese cypress boards excavated from the mud at the constricted spot of the shugo at the fourth research, and as a result, it was made clear that the original tree is presumed to have been cut down about in 210 at the latest.
sen.cmt: 訳漏れ。「第4次調査において」を補足しました。
sen.e: The Nara National Research Institute for Cultural Properties Archaeological Center measured the age of Japanese cypress boards excavated from the mud at the constricted spot of the shugo at the fourth research, and as a result, it was made clear that the original tree is presumed to have been cut down about in 210 at the latest.

sen.j: 年輪年代測定以前は、布留０式土器の出土により土器編年を利用し年代基準を決定していた。
sen.e: Before measuring the age from tree rings, the age criterion was determined by the unearthed Furu 0-type earthen vessels based on the chronology of earthen vessels.
Before measuring the age from tree rings, the age criterion was determined by the unearthed Furu 0-type earthen vessels based on the chronology of earthen vessels.
Before measuring the age from tree rings, the age criterion was determined by the unearthed Furu 0-type earthen vessels based on the chronology of earthen vessels.

sen.j: 土器編年による年代は西暦300年前後。
sen.e: The date estimated by the chronology is before or after 300.
The date estimated by the chronology is before or after 300.
The date estimated by the chronology is before or after 300.
Burier
sen.cmt: 埋葬者は被葬者のミスかも。その場合はBuried personとなります。
sen.e: Burier
Buried person
sen.cmt: Burier→Buried personこの場合は卑弥呼の父の墓ではとあるので、Burierでは意味をなさないためBuried personに変更しました。

sen.j: 新聞の掲載によると、卑弥呼の父の墓ではないか？、と言う説があがっている。
sen.e: Newspapers say that one theory suggests that it could be a Himeko's father's tomb
Newspapers say that one theory suggests that it could be a Himiko's father's tomb.
sen.cmt: スペル修正し、ピリオド補足しました。
sen.e: Newspapers say that one theory suggests that it could be a Himiko's father's tomb.
